title: Sierra Buttes Trail Stewardship links up the Lost Sierra with Connected Communities
content:
If you’ve done some travelling with your bike(s), you’ve probably noticed that a good trail network can attract a lot of visitors from far away places. Nowadays many rural areas once dominated by resource-based industries have turned to tourism, often encouraged by outdoor recreation, to keep their communities from dying off.
